creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: Left (embossed): [?????　二つの石灯篭] {1964nen saku, Futatsu no ishidōrō}; bottom, in pencil: [Two Lanterns] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Two Lanterns
